forecast.name: Today
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Drizzle then Partly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle before 11am. Partly sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

weather_report:
As the clock approaches mid-morning, Downtown San Francisco graces its residents with the familiar embrace of a cool, partly sunny day. The atmospheric haze lingers—a gentle reminder of the marine layer that often whispers in from the bay, drizzling soft memories of the morning mist, yet yielding to pockets of clarity that reveal glimpses of a silvery skyline. Today promises a high of 64, though the afternoon will draw temperatures into a mild embrace of around 62. The wind rustles modestly at 7 to 14 mph, occasionally brushing through the streets like a breezy companion, hinting at an energetic day ahead.

As you venture out, consider layering—a light sweater over a breathable shirt will serve well as you meander through neighborhoods, grabbing a coffee or losing yourself in the charm of a local bookstore. With clouds gathering for the night, a relaxed stroll along the Embarcadero could provide delightful views, as the sky prepares to blanket the city in a soft layer of moody gray. With all knits and twists of the day, it feels inviting and serene enough to explore while keeping an eye on the rolling fog that may call back soon, ensuring that San Francisco continues to captivate and enchant amidst its ever-changing panorama.
